body: OK, its been a day now. I had gold on SnakeV3nom10 and asked for it to be moved to this acc to make this one emerald. It ended up being removed. Please help. I want emerald :).
body_tagged: OK, its been a day now. I had gold on SnakeV3nom10 and asked for it to be moved to this acc to make this one emerald. It ended up being removed. Please help. I want emerald :).
title: Rank...

replies.body: Please be patient and if the rank isn't transferred in the next few days please contact support@avicus.net adding in as well that the rank was lost from your old account.
replies.body_tagged: Please be patient and if the rank isn't transferred in the next few days please contact support@avicus.net adding in as well that the rank was lost from your old account.

replies.body: Its been about a day since I lost it on my other account so I emailed support@avicus.net
replies.body_tagged: Its been about a day since I lost it on my other account so I emailed support@avicus.net

replies.body:
Please Email Support@Avicus.net

If you do not get a response with in 1 week 
decline your email immediately
replies.body_tagged:
Please Email Support@Avicus.net

If you do not get a response with in 1 week 
decline your email immediately

replies.body:
As stated above, you can email support if you have an issue.
But it's only been one day man, the staff have a lot to do.
Having patience is key :)
